entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: Set optional as default
entries.description: If true, all variables are optional by default

entries.title: Show -Create Variable Template- on data structure edit
entries.description: Show -Create Variable Template- on data structure edit

entries.title: Link variables to templates
entries.description: During data structure creation, variables are created. Is it mandatory to link these variables to templates.

entries.title: Link variables to meanings
entries.description: During data structure creation, variables are created. Is it mandatory to link these variables to meanings.

entries.title: File Analyze: Minimum row number
entries.description: Min number of rows to analyze structure.

entries.title: File Analyze: Maximum row number
entries.description: Max number of rows to analyze structure.

entries.title: File Analyze: Percentage of rows
entries.description: Percentage of rows to analyze structure.

entries.title: Similarity Threshold (0-100%)
entries.description: During the analysis of a file to create a data structure, templates and units are checked against the input using algorithms. the threshold specifies the minimum value that must be reached for the objects to be marked as suggestions. Set 0-100%

entries.title: Template Support
entries.description: if the template support is activated, then empty unit & datatype fields with information from the template are set when the data structure is created.
